text: On a winding road and at high speed, a drunk man was driving his car. Suddenly, he lost control of the car, went off the track and crashed into a pestilence pond. Several people, seeing the accident, ran to the scene and helped the driver get inside. He couldn't hide his drunkenness and then one of his assistants said, "But, haven't you read Narain Gupta's famous treatise on the harmful effects of alcohol? And the drunk driver, without stopping to ride, stuttered: FIN
title: El conductor borracho
author: nan Anónimo
